WHY MY FIT LIFE? BECAUSE SCIENCE.

We use your story, our experience, and the most up-to-date research to create an individualized plan just for you. Then we check in with you via weekly emails and bi-weekly 15-20 min calls. Imagine the results you’ll get with your own nutrition coach combined with the right food! That’s living right!
